name: twitchtvapp
description: A remake of my TwitchTV viewer app

scripts.build:scripts: browserify -x jquery -x bootstrap -x handlebars -x rxjs src/scripts/*.js -o dist/scripts/main.js
scripts.build:vendor: browserify -r jquery -r bootstrap -r handlebars -r rxjs -o dist/scripts/vendor.js && cat node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css  | cleancss -o dist/styles/bundle.css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css.map dist/styles/bootstrap.min.css.map
scripts.build:styles: postcss -u autoprefixer -p postcss-scss src/styles/main.scss | node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map=true > dist/styles/main.css
scripts.watch:js: onchange src/**/*.js -e src/test/**/*.js -- npm run build:scripts
scripts.build: npm run cleanup && npm run setupfolder && npm run build:vendor && npm run build:html && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles
scripts.start: npm run build && run-p watch:* -s server

author: Greg Smith
